content: ऐक्यं {@--1@} Oneness, unity, harmony; <ls>R. 10. 82</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 33.</ls> {@--2@} Unanimity. {@--3@} Identity, sameness. {@--4@} Especially, the identity of the human soul or of the universe with the Deity. {@--5@} An aggregate, whole. {@--6@} (In <ab>alg.</ab>) The product of the length and depth of the portions or little excavations differing in depth (Colebrooke).
